title: Who Is Vita Sidorkina’s Husband? Valerio Morabito’s Job & Relationship History
description: Discover the career and personal life of Valerio Morabito, Vita Sidorkina's husband. Explore now! The post Who Is Vita Sidorkina’s Husband? Valerio Morabito’s Job & Relationship History appeared first on ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More.
author: Namrata Ghosh
excerpt: Curious about Vita Sidorkina's husband? Get all the details about Valerio Morabito, their beautiful wedding, and their loving family life.
siteName: ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More
text: Netizens are curious to know all about Vita Sidorkina’s husband and her family life. Sidorkina stepped into the limelight after walking in the 2015 Victoria’s Secret Fashion Show. Since then, fans have eagerly sought glimpses into her personal life and her husband. Here’s everything we know about Vita Sidorkina’s husband, their children, and more. Who is Vita Sidorkina married to? Vita Sidorkina’s husband is Valerio Morabito. The stunning couple has been together for many years and continues to enjoy a loving family life with their children. They had a lavish wedding on July 29, 2017, at a historic palace off Italy’s Amalfi Coast. What is Valerio Morabito’s job? Valerio Morabito is an Italian real estate developer. He is a millionaire and the CEO of his own real estate company, Morabito Properties LLC, based in Miami, Florida. According to the company’s official LinkedIn page, Morabito Properties provides “modern luxury properties designed by the world’s finest architects.” Its website highlights Morabito’s impressive portfolio, showcasing his expertise in developing and transforming luxury properties. It states, “Passionate about design and its potential to transform the way people live, work, and play, he [Morabito] is committed to creating original, functional spaces with unique character.” Vita Sidorkina and Valerio Morabito’s relationship history Not much information is publicly available about how Vita Sidorkina met her husband, Valerio Morabito. However, fans speculate that they may have been together for around a decade. The Victoria’s Secret model announced her engagement to Morabito in December 2016. Seven months later, they tied the knot in an extravagant ceremony on the Amalfi Coast. Sidorkina and Morabito welcomed their first child, a daughter named Allegra, in November 2018. Their second daughter was born five years later, in November 2023. Although the couple tends to keep their relationship private, they are undoubtedly enjoying a happy and thriving family life.
html:
Netizens are curious to know all about Vita Sidorkina’s husband and her family life. Sidorkina stepped into the limelight after walking in the 2015 Victoria’s Secret Fashion Show. Since then, fans have eagerly sought glimpses into her personal life and her husband.

Here’s everything we know about Vita Sidorkina’s husband, their children, and more.

Who is Vita Sidorkina married to?

Vita Sidorkina’s husband is Valerio Morabito.

The stunning couple has been together for many years and continues to enjoy a loving family life with their children. They had a lavish wedding on July 29, 2017, at a historic palace off Italy’s Amalfi Coast.

What is Valerio Morabito’s job?

Valerio Morabito is an Italian real estate developer.

He is a millionaire and the CEO of his own real estate company, Morabito Properties LLC, based in Miami, Florida. According to the company’s official LinkedIn page, Morabito Properties provides “modern luxury properties designed by the world’s finest architects.”

Its website highlights Morabito’s impressive portfolio, showcasing his expertise in developing and transforming luxury properties. It states, “Passionate about design and its potential to transform the way people live, work, and play, he [Morabito] is committed to creating original, functional spaces with unique character.”

Vita Sidorkina and Valerio Morabito’s relationship history

Not much information is publicly available about how Vita Sidorkina met her husband, Valerio Morabito. However, fans speculate that they may have been together for around a decade. The Victoria’s Secret model announced her engagement to Morabito in December 2016. Seven months later, they tied the knot in an extravagant ceremony on the Amalfi Coast.

Sidorkina and Morabito welcomed their first child, a daughter named Allegra, in November 2018. Their second daughter was born five years later, in November 2023. Although the couple tends to keep their relationship private, they are undoubtedly enjoying a happy and thriving family life.
